name: Serv00
remark: Offers shell access; can run Python, Ruby, Perl, Java, TCL/TK, Lua, Erlang, Rust, Go, C, C++, D, R bots using screen or tmux; 3GB ssd, 512MB RAM

name: Lade.io
remark: Free tier seems discontinued or inactive

name: Alwaysdata
remark: 100 MB storage with MySQL, PostgreSQL, CouchDB, MongoDB, PHP, Python, Ruby, Node.js, Elixir, Java, Deno, custom web servers, access via FTP, WebDAV and SSH

name: Claw.Cloud
remark: $5/month free credits for users with a GitHub account older than 180 days.

name: Leapcell
remark: 3 VCPUs, 4GB Ram, 10000 async tasks, 100000 redis commands.

name: Bothost
remark: 256 MB RAM, 0.25 CPU, 1 GB Storage, 1 bot in free tier.
